```{r load packages}

suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(rgdal)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(maptools)
  library(sp)
  library(dplyr)
  library(tidyr)
})

```

```{r load spatial}

dir = "./Data/Spatial"

stat <- readOGR(dsn = dir, layer = "states")
stat <- stat[stat$NAME == "Oaxaca",]

muni <- readOGR(dsn = dir, layer = "Municipios__2000")
muni <- muni[muni$NOM_ENT == "Oaxaca",]
  

load("./Data/meanT.RData")

oax <- merge(fortify(stat), stat@data, by = intersect(names(stat), names(stat@data)))

oax_muni <- merge(fortify(muni), muni@data, by = intersect(names(muni), names(muni@data)))

temp <- group_by(temp, station) %>%
  summarize(latitude = mean(latitude, na.rm = T),
            longitude = mean(longitude, na.rm = T),
            maxYear = max(year),
            minYear =min(year))

```

```{r}

ggplot(data = oax, aes(x = long, y = lat)) +
  geom_polygon(aes(fill = NAME), alpha = 0.5, col = "black                                         ") +
  geom_point(data = temp, aes(x = longitude, y = latitude)) +
  theme_bw()

```
